int getRanges() Gets the masks for all of the ranges supported by this NumericShaper, packed into an int value using the logical OR logical operation for multiple ranges: NumericShaper.DEVANAGARI | NumericShaper.BENGALI.

int hashCode() Returns an integer hash code for this object.
boolean isContextual() Checks if this NumericShaper is contextual (supporting multiple script ranges) or not.
